lyrics.text:
Haʻu ‘eni fafine, ‘o ‘omi kia Sīsū
‘Enau tamaiki īki ke ne ala pē ki ai.
Ne ‘ita ‘a e kau ako, ‘o kapusi
ke mamaʻo
Kae tala ‘e Sīsū ke ‘un
u
aki mai.

“’Oua ‘e ta’ofi ‘a e fānau valevale.
‘I hoku pule’anga ‘oku ai pe ‘enau kau.
Kehe ke mou fa’itaki ki he fanga
ki’i tamaiki;
‘E, tuku ‘a e fānau ke haʻu kia au.”

“Ouae li’aki, pe fakasīkaka’i,
Ha taha he fa’ahinga ‘oku si’i
mo vaivai pē.
Ne ngutuhuaange ke nonoʻo ha
maka fale,
‘O pe’ehi ki tahi ha taha fai pehē.”

“’E, tuku ‘a e fānau ke haʻu ni kia au,
Na’i fanga lami ‘aku, mo e pele he Tamai.
Ko
e
tauhi he tamaiki kuo tuku ki houʻeiki,
He nopeli ‘i he ‘alofi ‘o Lang
i
.”

Pehē ‘ene na’ina’i heʻene teu ke ‘alu
“Fafanga ‘eku fanga lami, pea
tauhi ma’u.”
Neongo kuo hiki ‘oku ui ‘a e tamaiki.
“’E, tuku ‘a e fānau ke haʻu kia au.”
